# lastResumeDate

**Instance Property**

The date when the activity was last resumed.

## Declaration

```swift
var lastResumeDate: Date? { get }
```

## Discussion

- If the activity was first started, this will be the same as the start date.
- If the activity was paused and resumed, this will be the date when the activity was resumed.

## Getting the activity properties

- **duration**: The total time elapsed while in active state.
- **startDate**: The date when the activity was initially started.
- **endDate**: The date when the activity was officially ended.
- **creationDate**: The date when the activity was created.
